content: tyrkys bolero pattern has been published in diana - crochet fashion number 18 published pattern needs a few experience with crocheting so i decided to make this bolero for myself and make photo instruction there you can see how to make v necklace on front side material 25dkg simplicity company toptex /czech production/ 100% cotton 50gr cca 125m i used all material so probably would be better use 30dkg for size 36-38 instruction front side start with 43 chain continue with pattern below start with stitch before vv end after vv www e-pleteni cz - chain i - single_crochet t - double_crochet 2 row 3 row from right side make only part of pattern www e-pleteni cz www e-pleteni cz www e-pleteni cz left front side is crochet same way back side start with 86 chain crochet with patter until we reach 26cm sleeve www e-pleteni cz start with 43 chain continue until reach 3 patterns then increase on both sides of sleeve one pattern www e-pleteni cz other sleeve crochet same way sew sleeves together sew also sides and finish with crochet around necklace with border it is finished www e-pleteni cz www e-pleteni cz
